item.title: GhERF108
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D08G13101 Gene Symbol: GhERF108 Gene Name: Genome: TM-1 reference genome Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The transcription factor ERF108 interacts with AUXIN RESPONSE FACTORs to mediate cotton fiber secondary cell wall biosynthesis.

item.title: GhVIN1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhVIN1 Gene Name: vacuolar invertase1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Silencing the vacuolar invertase gene GhVIN1 blocks cotton fiber initiation from the ovule epidermis, probably by suppressing a cohort of regulatory genes via sugar signaling.
